data.title: Women and Kinship in Medieval Moroccan Hagiography: a Study of al-Bādisī’s al-Maqsad al-sharīf (Eighth/Fourteenth Century)
data.meta_description: Women and Kinship in Medieval Moroccan Hagiography: a Study of al-Bādisī’s al-Maqsad al-sharīf (Eighth/Fourteenth Century) was published in Family Portraits with Saints on page 394.
data.text:
Marín, Manuela. "Women and Kinship in Medieval Moroccan Hagiography: a Study of al-Bādisī’s al-Maqsad al-sharīf (Eighth/Fourteenth Century)". Family Portraits with Saints: Hagiography, Sanctity, and Family in the Muslim World, edited by Alexandre Papas and Catherine Mayeur-Jaouen, Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter, 2020, pp. 394-419. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783112208991-013
